snippet: The Utah branch of Planned Parenthood asked a federal appeals court to stop Gov. Gary R. Herbert from cutting off funding to the organization.
lead_paragraph: The Utah branch of Planned Parenthood asked a federal appeals court to stop Gov. Gary R. Herbert from cutting off funding to the organization.

headline.main: Utah: Court Hears Appeal by Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Utah: Court Hears Appeal By Planned Parenthood
